welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Suwanee, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and delicious dining options. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and discover all that Suwanee has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Winder Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
